title: Let Go
lyrics:
After MAMA in Hong Kong, BTS’s speech for winning Artist of the Year revealed that they thought of disbanding at the beggining of the same year. Let Go is a farewell song from BTS to their fans.

Jimin

So be it don't cry, I'ma let you go and fly
